4) PLATFORM CONVENTIONS: Uses Xiaohongshu signifiers — listicle format, casual imperative voice, highlighted takeaways, and hand-drawn-style emphasis — invoking influencer authenticity and peer-to-peer advice; absence of brand logos suggests organic recommendation rather than paid ad.

5) CONSUMER PSYCHOLOGY: Persuades by activating loss aversion and social-proof: fear of preventable harm + implicit consensus (“军医看了都摇头”, “别问为什么”) motivates compliant purchase/behavior while maintaining in-group savvy status among informed users.
